x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Sports teams face challenges in monitoring players’ health, vitals, and performance during training and matches. Minor injuries or abnormal vitals may go undetected, impacting player safety and team performance.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • IoT Integration for wearable sensors with ServiceNow
  • Event Management
  • Notifications & Workflows
  • Service Portal
  • NowAssist
  • Virtual Agent
  • Dashboards for coaches and medical staff
  • Predictive Intelligence for injury/fatigue prediction
  • CMDB / Asset Management for wearable devices

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Wearable IoT devices to track player vitals (heart rate, oxygen levels, movement).
  • API integration between wearable sensors and ServiceNow Event Management.
  • Secure data storage for health and performance metrics.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring real-time data accuracy during dynamic sports activities.
  • Maintaining privacy and compliance with health regulations.
  • Configuring alert thresholds to avoid false positives that may disrupt training.
